com.niton.media.audio.nio.basic

Interface MusicListener


  • public interface MusicListener
    This is the Listener class for Player (Music)
    This are listeners to events that happen in a Player
    Version:
    2018-04-05
    Author:
    Niton

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPlayFinished(Player p)
      Description : This method should be called when the Stream has ended peacful.
      void onTimeChange(int time, Player p)
      Called when the time on the Player changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onTimeChange

        void onTimeChange(int time,
                  Player p)
        Called when the time on the Player changed.
        This should be called permanently while the Players State is PlayState.PLAY
        Parameters:
        time - the new position of the Player
        p - the Player caused the event

      • onPlayFinished

        void onPlayFinished(Player p)
        Description : This method should be called when the Stream has ended peacful.
        The State of the Player should be PlayState.FINISHED
        Parameters:
        p - the Player caused the event
